para.example: Example: Dim loDocument As Document = New Document(123) Dim loFile As File = loDocument.AddMainFile("Invoice", "c:\invoice.tif", "An", False)

member.name: T:Arco.Doma.Library.ACL.ACL_Copy
member.summary: Copies the ACL records from DM_SOURCE_OBJECT_ID to DM_OBJECT_ID
member.remarks:
Both objects MUST have their own ACL, meaning OBJ_ID = ACL_OBJ_ID
Usually used after an ACL_OVERRIDE Usage example
Dim loACLOverride As Arco.Doma.Library.ACL.ACL_Override = New Arco.Doma.Library.ACL.ACL_Override(mlObjectID) loACLOverride.Override() Dim loACLCopy As Arco.Doma.Library.ACL.ACL_Copy = New Arco.Doma.Library.ACL.ACL_Copy(mlObjectID, mlInheritedObjectID) loACLCopy.Copy()

member.name: M:Arco.Doma.Library.Website.ScreenItem.Save
member.summary: Save. Inserts or updates one record in table DM_SCREEN_ITEM.

member.name: T:Arco.Doma.Library.Website.ScreenItem
member.summary: This class reflects a row of table DM_SCREEN_ITEM.

para.example: Example Insert: Dim loScreenItem As ScreenItem loScreenItem = ScreenItem.NewScreenItem(123) loScreenItem.ITEM_ID = 124 loScreenItem.ITEM_TYPE = 2 loScreenItem.Mode = ItemMode.ReadOnly loScreenItem.Save() loScreenItem.Dispose() loScreenItem = Nothing

Example Update: Dim loScreenItem As ScreenItem loScreenItem = ScreenItem.GetScreenItem(123, 124) loScreenItem.Mode = ItemMode.ReadOnly loScreenItem.Save() loScreenItem.Dispose() loScreenItem = Nothing
Example Delete: ScreenItem.DeleteScreenItems(123)

member.name: T:Arco.Doma.Library.ACL.User
member.summary: This class reflects a row of table RTUSERS.

para.example: Example Insert: Dim loUser As User = User.NewUser("ARCO\PETER") loUser.USER_DISPLAY_NAME = "Peter" loUser.USER_AUTH_METHOD = 1 loUser.USER_STATUS = 2 loUser.Save() loUser.Dispose() loUser = Nothing
Example Update: Dim loUser As User = User.GetUser("ARCO\PETER") loUser.USER_FIRSTNAME = "Peter" loUser.Save() loUser.Dispose() loUser = Nothing
Example Delete: Debug.WriteLine(User.DeleteUserWithCheck("ARCO\PETER"))
Example Fetch current user: Dim loUser As User = User.GetCurrentUser() Debug.WriteLine(loUser.USER_FIRSTNAME) Debug.WriteLine(loUser.USER_LASTNAME) loUser.Dispose() loUser = Nothing

member.summary: This class reflects a row of table DM_MAIL.

para.example: Example Insert: Dim loMail As DMMail = DMMail.Create() loMail.Subject = "Test e-mail" loMail.From = "mark@arco.be" loMail.MailTo = "walter@arco.be" loMail.Body = "Test" loMail.Mail_Date = Now loMail.Type = Mail_Type.Outgoing loMail.Owner = Security.BusinessIdentity.CurrentIdentity.Name loMail.Save() loMail.Send(True, False) loMail.Dispose() loMail = Nothing
Example Update: Dim loMail As DMMail = DMMail.GetMail(123) loMail.Subject = "Test e-mail" loMail.Save() loMail.Dispose() loMail = Nothing
Example Delete: DMMail.DeleteMail(123)

member.name: T:Arco.Doma.Library.baseObjects.DM_PROPERTY
member.summary: This class reflects a row of table RTPROPERTY.

para.example: Example Insert: Dim loProperty As DM_PROPERTY = DM_PROPERTY.NewPROPERTY() loProperty.PROP_NAME = "Address" loProperty.PROP_TYPE = "STRING" loProperty.PROP_LENGTH = 200 loProperty.DM_CAT_ID = 123 loProperty.Save() loProperty.Dispose() loProperty = Nothing
Example Update: Dim loProperty As DM_PROPERTY = DM_PROPERTY.GetPROPERTY(123) loProperty.PROP_NAME = "Address" loProperty.Save() loProperty.Dispose() loProperty = Nothing
Example Delete: DM_PROPERTY.DeletePROPERTY(123)

Example Translation: Dim loProperty As DM_PROPERTY = DM_PROPERTY.GetPROPERTY(123) Debug.WriteLine(loProperty.GetPropertyLabel.LABEL_ENGLISH) Debug.WriteLine(loProperty.GetPropertyLabel.LABEL_FRENCH) Debug.WriteLine(loProperty.GetPropertyLabel.LABEL_DUTCH) Debug.WriteLine(loProperty.GetPropertyLabel.LABEL_GERMAN) loProperty.Dispose() loProperty = Nothing

para.example: Example Insert: Dim loScreen As Screen loScreen = Screen.NewScreen() loScreen.Name = "Result screen for invoices" loScreen.Mode = ScreenMode.RESULT loScreen.Type = ScreenSourceType.DefaultMode loScreen.Category = 123 loScreen.Status = ScreenStatus.Active loScreen.Save() loScreen.Dispose loScreen = Nothing

Example Delete: Screen.DeleteScreen(123)

member.summary: Wrapper class for easy folder handling.

para.example: Example Insert: Dim loFolder As Folder = New Folder() Dim lbOK As Boolean = False loFolder.Name = "Invoice" loFolder.Category = 123 loFolder.Parent_Folder = 124 loFolder.Create(False, 0) ' ... lbOK = loFolder.CommitCreation loFolder.Dispose() loFolder = Nothing
Example Update: Dim loFolder As Folder = New Folder() loFolder.ID = 123 loFolder.Name = "Invoice" loFolder.Save() loFolder.Dispose() loFolder = Nothing
Example Delete: Dim loFolder As Folder = New Folder(123) loFolder.Delete() loFolder.Dispose() loFolder = Nothing

member.name: F:Arco.Doma.Library.ACL.ACL_Override.DM_OBJECT_ID
member.summary: Object_id of the object you want to override the ACL for

member.name: M:Arco.Doma.Library.ACL.ACL_Override.#ctor(System.Int32)
member.summary: ctor of the Command
member.param: Object_id of the object you want to override the ACL for

member.name: M:Arco.Doma.Library.ACL.ACL_Override.Override
member.summary: Execute the Override Command

member.name: T:Arco.Doma.Library.ACL.ACL_Override
member.summary: Overrides the ACL on DM_OBJECT Before the override the OBJ_ACL_ID != OBJ_ID AND OBJ_ACL_ID = DM_OLD_OBJECT_ID (2nd parameter in the constructor) After the override OBJ_ACL_ID = OBJ_ID This only overrides the ACL, it does not copy the acl records from the original object where the acl was linked All the child objects of this object who orginially inherited from DM_OLD_OBJECT_ID, will also now inherit acl from this object

remarks.example:
Usually used followed by an ACL_Copy Usage example
Dim loACLOverride As Arco.Doma.Library.ACL.ACL_Override = New Arco.Doma.Library.ACL.ACL_Override(mlObjectID, mlInheritedObjectID) loACLOverride.Override() Dim loACLCopy As Arco.Doma.Library.ACL.ACL_Copy = New Arco.Doma.Library.ACL.ACL_Copy(mlObjectID, mlInheritedObjectID) loACLCopy.Copy()

member.name: T:Arco.Doma.Library.ACL.ACL_RESET
member.summary: Reset all the child objects so that they inherit from this object again
member.remarks:
This action will result in the loss of all custom acl records on the child objects
Dim loReset As Arco.Doma.Library.ACL.ACL_RESET = New Arco.Doma.Library.ACL.ACL_RESET(mlObjectID) loReset.Reset()

member.name: M:Arco.Doma.Library.baseObjects.DM_OBJECT.ReplaceACL(System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Replace the subject in one OBJECT_ACL record with another Subject
member.returns: True if the acl record was found and replaced
member.remarks:
This can only be done when =
To replace DOMAIN\GROUP1 by DOMAIN\GROUP2 in the OBJECT_ACL list of this object :
obj.ReplaceACL("DOMAIN\GROUP1","Group","DOMAIN\GROUP2","Group2")

member.name: M:Arco.Doma.Library.baseObjects.DM_OBJECT.AddACL(System.String,System.String,System.Boolean,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Adds an OBJECT ACL record to this record Optionally this will override the ACL from the parent if needed
member.param: When this is set to true the add only happens if = , when false an is executed if needed
When set to true, an is performed after overriding the acl, when false no copy is made
member.returns: The ACL_ID of the OBJECT_ACL record, this can be used in the function
member.remarks:
This can only be done when = or vbOnlyWhenNotInheriting = false
Give DOMAIN\USER1 full control on this object
Dim liACLID as int32 = obj.AddACL("DOMAIN\USER1","User",false,true) if liACLID > 0 then obj.AddAClRight(liACLID,20) else See the remarks tag for possible exceptions end if

para.example: Example Insert: Dim loItem As WorkException loItem = WorkException.NewWorkException() loItem.SUBJECT_ID = "ARCO\ArcoUser" loItem.SUBJECT_TYPE = "User" loItem.DELEGATE_FROM_ID = "ARCO\SOMEONE_ON_A_HOLIDAY" loItem.DELEGATE_FROM_TYPE ="User" loItem.OBJECT_ID = 456 loItem.OBJECT_TYPE = "Procedure" loItem.Save() loItem.Dispose() loItem = Nothing
Example Delete: WorkException.DeleteWorkException(123)

member.name: T:Arco.Doma.Library.Mail.DM_MailingUser
member.summary: This class reflects a row of table DM_MAILINGUSER.

para.example: Example Insert: Dim loMailingUser As DM_MailingUser = DM_MailingUser.NewMailingUser("Walter") loMailingUser.MailEmail = "w.v.goten@arco.be" loMailingUser.MailSync = 1 loMailingUser.Save() loMailingUser.Dispose() loMailingUser = Nothing

Example Update: Dim loMailingUser As DM_MailingUser = DM_MailingUser.GetMailingUser(New DM_MailingUser.Criteria("Walter")) loMailingUser.MailEmail = "w.v.goten@arco.be" loMailingUser.Save() loMailingUser.Dispose() loMailingUser = Nothing
Example Delete: DM_MailingUser.DeleteMailingUser(123)

Example retrieving groups of a member: Dim loMailingUser As DM_MailingUser = DM_MailingUser.GetMailingUser(New DM_MailingUser.Criteria("Walter")) Dim loGroups As DM_MailingListList = loMailingUser.Groups() For Each loGroup As DM_MailingListList.MailingListInfo In loGroups Debug.WriteLine(loGroup.MailName) Next loGroups = Nothing loMailingUser.Dispose() loMailingUser = Nothing

member.name: T:Arco.Doma.Library.Mail.DM_MailingList
member.summary: This class reflects a row of table DM_MAILINGLIST.

para.example: Example Insert: Dim loMailingList As DM_MailingList = DM_MailingList.NewMailingList("Sales") loMailingList.MailEmail = "ArcoGroupSales@arco-information.com" loMailingList.MailSync = 1 loMailingList.Save() loMailingList.Dispose() loMailingList = Nothing

Example Update: Dim loMailingList As DM_MailingList = DM_MailingList.GetMailingList(New DM_MailingList.Criteria("Sales")) loMailingList.MailEmail = "ArcoGroupSales@arco-information.com" loMailingList.Save() loMailingList.Dispose() loMailingList = Nothing
Example Delete: DM_MailingList.DeleteMailingList(123)

Example retrieving members of a group: Dim loMailingList As DM_MailingList = DM_MailingList.GetMailingList(New DM_MailingList.Criteria("Sales")) Dim loUsers As DM_MailingUserList = loMailingList.Users() For Each loUser As DM_MailingUserList.MailingUserInfo In loUsers Debug.WriteLine(loUser.MailName) Next loUsers = Nothing loMailingList.Dispose() loMailingList = Nothing

para.example: Example: Dim loList As ScreenList Dim loScreen As ScreenList.ScreenInfo Dim loCrit As ScreenList.Criteria loCrit = New ScreenList.Criteria loCrit.DM_CAT_ID = 123 loList = ScreenList.GetScreenList(loCrit) For Each loScreen In loList Debug.WriteLine(loScreen.Name) Debug.WriteLine(loScreen.Type) Next loList = Nothing
